solution_line_template: 40 people were roller skating and they all had {feet_per_person} feet which means there were {num_people}*{feet_per_person} = <<{num_people}*{feet_per_person}={total_feet}>>{total_feet} feet

Each foot needs a roller skate and each roller skate has {wheels_per_skate} wheels so {total_feet}*{wheels_per_skate} = <<{total_feet}*{wheels_per_skate}={total_wheels}>>{total_wheels} wheels when everyone skated
